refnamediv.refpurpose: Adds an exchange. First the account data for the receiver of the exchange is set. In the case the DTA file contains credits, this is the payment receiver.

refentry.refsect1:
&title.param;
&type.array; $account_receiver
Receiver's account data.
double $amount
Amount of money in this exchange. Currency: EURO
&type.array; $purposes
Array of up to 15 lines (maximally 27 chars each) for description of the exchange.
&type.array; $account_sender
Sender's account data.
